generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and a central dividing line, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible, including a large multi-story building on the right and residential buildings on the left.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sidewalks and near the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver van parked on the left and other vehicles driving in the distance.
- truck: A red and white fire truck is prominently visible in the center of the road, approaching the camera.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting streetlights and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
